title: How Can Households Make Better Investment Decisions? (Institute of International and Development Studies)
text: ( Source : Institute of International and Development Studies ) New research from Ugo Panizza, the Graduate Institute's Pictet Chair in Finance and Development , highlights the dramatic cost of poor financial decision-making by middle-class
